content: skill level easy **materials ** * lily sugar n cream stripes 4 2 oz balls or 3 2 5 oz balls *or* * bernat handicrafter cotton stripes 5 1 5 oz balls * size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook * 4 grommets for a very similar pattern worked to a slightly larger gauge see bag to crochet 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bag-to-crochet
